docs.text: Loan Acceptance Prediction API Welcome to the API for predicting loan acceptance based on customer data! Use this API to predict whether a customer will accept a personal loan offer based on their profile features.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the API for predicting loan acceptance based on customer data! Use this API to predict whether a customer will accept a personal loan offer based on their profile features.
docs.title: Loan Acceptance Prediction API

docs.text: API Overview Start the Server poetry run uvicorn app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 Access Swagger UI http://localhost:8000/docs Supported Features Prediction for multiple customers at once Probability outputs for predictions Example Input: { "features": [ [45, 100000, 5, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0], [50, 120000, 3, 0, 2, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0], [35, 90000, 3, 1, 0, 2, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0] ] } Output: { "predictions": [ 1, 1, 1 ], "probabilities": [ 0.9999530273938793, 0.9999899265919541, 0.9994081409953709 ] }
docs.title: Overview
